to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.model

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.model.Message
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdjustSpeedMessage, AuthenticationFailedMessage, AuthenticationMessage, BatteryPowerMessage, CameraConnectionParameterMessage, FeatureMessage, GreetingMessage, LocationMessage, RequestCameraMessage, RotateCameraMessage, SetUpCyclicUpdateMessage, TurnCarMessage

    public abstract class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    Base type for all Message send between Host and Client. The messages will be (de)serialized into JSON.
    Author:
    sven
